website_summaries.verdict: Large programmable machine with lots of features for easy, convenient use and maintenance.
pros: Black and chrome façade makes for a sleek aesthetic
Brews up to 12 cups at a time
Water filtration system helps coffee taste better
cons: Price is higher than some other Mr. Coffee programmable machines

customer_reviews.title: Love 😍 ☕️
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee pot! So so easy in every way! The mechanism to take the top off and wash it is super each to detach and reattach. Simple set up for brew now or brew later. Included a note in the carafe to make sure you know that the brew now button is just like an on off switch and if you want to shut it down before it times out, you just hit the same button to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Napier

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Keurig
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 32 oz mug and this bad boy and now I leave the house with all the coffee I need for a day. I like that it has a reusable filter but I might get paper filters as I'm lazy and I'm not sure how good the small amount of coffee grounds going down my drain is. Delay Brew is simple and easy. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Thought Mr Coffee was one of the “better” brands of coffee makers! I was wrong. Purchased on 9/15/19 and it went haywire on 10/22/19. Just past the return date. Little scary when you go to make your coffee and “nothing” has been turned on all day however, I burned my fingers on the “hot plate” that should have been cold! I instantly unplugged the maker in fear of burning something. Thought I was getting a better quality maker by paying a little more than I normally do. Guess I was sooo wrong! Will not purchase again. Only lasted a little more than a month. 👎
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Why don't more companies have a machine like this?
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is a great choice as far as reasonably priced coffee makers with glass carafes are concerned. It makes good tasting hot coffee and the build quality is fine so far. time will tell on that I suppose but for now, everything's holding up. The fact that you can disassemble this and put the majority of it in the dishwasher is a big plus! More companies should have machines like this. Now, they need to make this style of machine with no warming plate and a thermal carafe. that would be a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: Chrome finish  flaking into my coffee
customer_reviews.text: I loved this coffee maker when I bought it but within a month the chrome trim began to flake off in tiny glittery flakes into my coffee. Amazon concierge tried to help but nothing came of it. Mr Coffee rep never contacted me as promised. I finally called Mr Coffee and had to resend pictures of the damage with my receipt which is what the amazon rep did 3 weeks ago. No similar replacement available and they want me to send back the bad one before I can get the replacement which is not even like the one I had purchased. Watch out with that fake chrome trim. It seems to be on a lot of the models.
customer_reviews.author: michelle G

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Coffee 12 Cup Programmable Coffee Maker with Dishwashable Design | Advanced Water Filtration | Black/Chrome. I am a long time Mr. Coffee user and decided to replace my 6 year old machine with this newer model. I was desirous of the ability to put much of the machine in the dishwasher, have a reservoir that was handy/easier to fill, not having to use paper filters and having auto off after 4 hrs instead of 2. It's also just an updated machine. I chose to spend a little more than in the past. The machine has been exactly what I hoped for and is outstanding. Coffee tastes great, of course.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Easy. Simple. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been sick of all of the complicated and expensive machines that collect gunk in impossible to clean locations and this was a breath of fresh air. It is easy to use and cleans completely in the dishwasher. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This coffee pot is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very "cheap" feel to it. The parts are flimsy and easily breakable. I have had this pot for less than a week and the reusable filter has torn. The inner water spout has a removable cover for cleaning, but it is not easy to remove and I am worried I will break this part within weeks. This is not a item I would have purchased if I would have had the chance to see it first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t drink the silver film!
customer_reviews.text: I have been finding small silver film flakes on the counter top and couldn’t figure out where they were coming from. Today they were on top of the pot. Luckily I saw them before I filled my cup. The picture Amazon provides of the coffee maker shows very shiny silver trim. It’s a thin film that flakes right off. See my picture for yourself. It will still make a decent cup of coffee but I’m not impressed with the quality. I can’t believe Mr Coffee puts their name on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: The plastic hinge on the top cover broke after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Can't buy replacement parts at Mr. Coffee online or through a online parts supplier. Not worth driving to the only listed service center in my state. Very disappointed that you can't just order a new lid since this model is made to come apart so that the non-electrical parts can be cleaned in your dishwasher. Sounds good but I would not buy this model again...look for a simple design that is not made to be taken apart to be dishwasher cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient
customer_reviews.text: There is very fine coffee that gets through the reusable filter. I have tried multiple different coffees to try and find a solution but it seems to happen with all brands. I know that I can purchase filters but I was looking forward to not having to deal with them. I also do not like that I cannot open the top when the unit is under the cabinet. I have to pull the whole unit from it’s spot in order to add/toss out the used coffee grounds and add water. I do find it very easy to clean and the programmable feature works very well. Wish it were an inch shorter and the filter was better
customer_reviews.author: MarriedLife

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! The best yet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffee pot! Mr. Coffee has outdone itself. It does everything, and it’s easy to clean and not complicated to work. I liked it so much that I ordered another one a week later. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JanieB

customer_reviews.title: Great idea with faulty electronics
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way this worked, when it worked.There is a serious Electronics problem with this coffee maker.A couple of weeks after we got it,I set the brew later setting.and it immediately started brewing.When I read the user guide, it said to unplug ,and replug to reset.This worked, but it now has been happening on regular basis.Some times it would not reset ,and even the brew now, or the clock reset would not work.While I loved this coffee maker, it will now not reset at all.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Baron

customer_reviews.title: Good but be aware of a few things
customer_reviews.text: Cool that it comes apart to clean. Be careful with available space to open it at top because the area where you pour in water and put coffee opens to the left side at the top, and it takes quite a bit of space to open if you are planning to put it under a cabinet. We do get quite a bit of coffee ground residue at the bottom of the pot, using the included coffee basket. But it’s a good coffeemaker.
customer_reviews.author: E. Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Almost a perfect but still great coffee pot.
customer_reviews.text: Almost a perfect coffee pot. Love the ease of cleaning. The breaking down of the machine for a deep cleaning compatible with a dish washer is fantastic. My one complaint with the flavor and use is that when making a larger pot of coffee (8c or more) the percolation chamber that holds the grounds and water isn't big enough and frequently runs over putting grounds in the finished coffee. I still cling to the grounds brewing method. I prefer this style instead of k cups so that way I can stir in spices like ginger and turmeric into the ground pre-brew.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Ramey

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE AND EFFICIENT
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little coffee pot that does the trick. Easy to use, easy to clean. Simple features to set time and BREW time, and it delivers when it says it will. The coffee stay nice and hot and the flavor is great. We remove the filter and allow it to dry out as opposed to leaving in the coffee pot when we're finished brewing. We like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Mr. Coffee I have owned. I was expecting an upgrade from earlier models which we loved. Although filling the machine is so much better, the coffee flavor is lacking. Using the same measurement as I’ve done in the past, the flavor is much weaker. Having tried different measurements and coffee, I still preferred the earlier model. Putting this aside while we use our Kuerig machine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love mine! I love you can take it all apart it comes with the filter it’s got big opening for the water it’s real pretty too I highly recommend d! 5 star from me. Please get more so my mom can get one
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: It's a healthy coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing is it being dishwasher safe, the top comes off & can go in your dishwasher. And having a charcoal water filter is an added bonus for getting the most out of your coffee taste. Also I like the 4 hour warming plate.
customer_reviews.author: Gracey Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I loved a lot of things about this coffeemaker. It made good coffee and was easy to clean. The only annoying thing about maintaining it was the cost of the water filtration pads. I bought it because I was so bad at keeping other coffee makers clean because of the inconvenience. Because this was so easy to clean I stayed on top of things, washing the dishwasher parts weekly and using the clean function with vinegar monthly. Despite all this it kicked the bucket after 6 months. Despite the power being on (clock and buttons still lit up) It stopped pumping water (and vinegar) through.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve only used it once but like that it’s so simple to operate. It definitely was what I had been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe's wife

customer_reviews.title: Mr Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes a full pot faster than any I have used before. If you remove the pot before it is finished brewing, it does not drip onto the hot plate. I have found that all previous machines I have used did that. After a few weeks, everything is working good, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality assurance
customer_reviews.text: Whomever in quality assurance department must've been sleeping when my model was made. Received yesterday, missing 2 rubber feet from the bottom. Called them only to get someone who barely speaks English, and be told that they don't have rubber feet. They made me call a vacuum repair shop, and again no feet anywhere to be found. Won't be buying this brand ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son on Asia. Program function is useful. Easy to use and figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe❤️
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to clean in dishwasher, the delay time set is super easy to use and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lolakitty

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker but watch out for the extra water
customer_reviews.text: Really good coffee maker except it does get water everywhere. I am learning you have to let it sit for a bit before actually pouring it ans open the top part lf the machine very slowly. Aside from that, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee turned out to be Mr. Cold
customer_reviews.text: When you put the water in it would leak down On the the hot plate and Would steam, How would have to put the coffee cup in the microwave to heat it up just doesn't get hot enough
customer_reviews.author: H. E. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it !
customer_reviews.text: We are replacing a 3 yr. old Mr. Coffee . The wife says this definitely makes a better cup of coffee than our old one !! Also nice is that it can go in the dishwasher !
customer_reviews.author: Mark 5

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coffee Maker!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Low cost, easy to use, SUPER easy to clean, & the coffee tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  Lasts only 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This coffeemaker performed well from January 2020 when it was purchased until July 2020 when it began leaving large amounts of grounds in each brewed pot. Tried cleaning and adding paper filter neither if which helped. Grounds seem to overflow the filter. I use 8 tablespoons per 12 cups of water. Would not recommend a coffeemaker that only lasts 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Burning Every Pot of Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This has a four-hour shutoff time. Unless I remember to turn it off right away, anything under a full pot of coffee will burn the hell out of the brew. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: thenewjackieo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I like the programmable feature that briefly shows the time it will start when you turn on the timer. The shape of 5he carafe is good. A bit wider opening that washes better in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Lange

customer_reviews.title: Good cup of coffee, I'm told.
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't drink coffee. But my company enjoyed the ease of this machine & remarked that it made a very good cup of coffee. Cleanup was easy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ware

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: We bought this coffee maker for the increased ability to clean it. However, it often leaks water. We thought it was only happening if we prepared it the night before. Now it happens even when preparing it in the morning. 😔. Ours was not worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all about this coffee maker. It was inexpensive. It is easy to set up and use. And it makes great coffee.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: simple to use and set up easy to clean...makes great coffee....dont use timer...but a nice feature....like that it turns off after 4 hrs
customer_reviews.author: John Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good coffee maker for the money
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker always allows grounds into the coffee. The grounds spill over the top of the basket and the coffee always taste bitter. This is not my favorite mr coffee product and I’m sorry but I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MLiss Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Found this Mr. Coffee to be easy to use, easy to clean, and I love the reusable filter. I’ve had several Mr. Coffee’s that do a great job at a very affordable price, and this continues the experience for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Litz

customer_reviews.title: A "clean" cup every time!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it about 6 weeks ago. So far I love it. So easy to keep clean. No more "dirty" coffee. Worth the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy clean, great coffee!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great cup of coffee. Easy to disassemble and clean. Only down for me is the auto off timer. I'd rather 2hrs like my old one. This has 4hr auto off.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great for when guests are visiting
customer_reviews.text: Got this for when we have guests, and it is perfect! Easy to use, easy to clean, decent coffee
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nelson

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new coffee maker! Perfect size and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: brunettewithabook

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive...coffee is fine..reasonable value
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, easy to use coffe maker. A little light weight construction....lots of plastic. Largely cleanable via dish washer. Not used for very long....reasonable value...coffee is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Musical GrandPa

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee maker. It has been working great and have no problems. The price was fair too.
customer_reviews.author: Murf

customer_reviews.title: Can always count on Mr. Coffeemaker!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Mr. Coffee Maker to replace one that was old. I like the newer features that a lot of it is dishwasher safe. Most importantly, my husband likes it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dad he found it very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY C. TATRO

customer_reviews.title: Best coffeemaker I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can clean it in the dishwasher! I clean it weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: the coffee maker leaks
customer_reviews.text: I wake up most mornings to a puddle of water on the counter. I am trying to return the coffee maker now. In the past I have liked the Mr. Coffee machines but this one has been a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart
customer_reviews.text: The design and build quality on this particular model isn't up to Mr Coffee's normal standards. The auto shutoff comes apart in the dishwasher. Exasperating do look for little plastic parts before the caffeine jump start!
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts stay away
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and the coffee machine is missing the back two white rubber stoppers on the bottom of the coffee machine. This makes the coffee machine extremely dangerous since it can easily slide off the counter and cut and or burn family members. Tried to get a hold of someone at amazon but it was impossible to do so.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. The coffee brews a little strong so keep that in mind when preparing the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: General
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use...coffee filter holder is a little “short” making it a little difficult at times to get the grounds out without spilling them. Would not keep me from purchasing again. The brew is great as is the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: sandy bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great so far only have had it for a week have not had any issues with it yet
customer_reviews.text: Great so far only have had it for a week have not had any issues with it yet
customer_reviews.author: patricia tascher

customer_reviews.title: Ease of cleaning brew levels inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that the amount of water you put in reservoir is never the amount that brews. In order to get 8 cups of coffee I have to fill the reservoir up to 10. And sometimes that doesn’t make a difference. Love the ease of cleaning but disappointed with the water issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best coffee makers I have ever purchased. Easy to use, great tasting coffee, etc. It died after 5 months. Very disappointed because it truly was a stellar product.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie72

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt get hot enough. Drips on plate when you remove decanter to pour coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this coffee maker. Works as advertised. Does come apart for easy cleaning. Makes good coffee. Is easy to program to brew later.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Geraghty

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think it was worth the money. Now I have to buy water filters.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: sold me a defective item
customer_reviews.text: machine works for 5-15 mins then suddenly nothing works. The plug was still in the power outlet and I checked my outlet, which works fine for my boiler. I am super disappointed. I got sold a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Filter issues
customer_reviews.text: The filter is really thin and cheap. It only lasted a couple times before it started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: chris green

customer_reviews.title: Stays on longer than most coffee makers.
customer_reviews.text: What sold me on on this coffee maker is the fact that it stays on longer than most.I don't feel like I have to rush thru my morning coffee before it shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: The burner temp is to high and will burn coffee if not turned off when it is done brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after wash.
customer_reviews.text: Has a long turn off time and quiet working after I washed it in the dishwasher the first time
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Stensberg

customer_reviews.title: Auto shut off is very important in case you rush out the door and forget.
customer_reviews.text: Automatic turn off is a must! Programming for delay coffee turn on is great!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great item and price
customer_reviews.text: Coffee pot is great. However the basket did not work. It would not let water run through it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Not easily removable to clean. Warming plate already chipped and discolored.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Steinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee is good so far after about a month
customer_reviews.text: A basic coffee maker but it is easy to use and clean, and makes good tasting coffee
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: I have to get another coffee pot already
customer_reviews.text: It was nice at first now we can't even get the top to close. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Martin

customer_reviews.title: My mother loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this for my mother who drinks coffee in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: RobertCFerrell

customer_reviews.title: You will be sorry sooner or later
customer_reviews.text: A piece of junk. Received this and tried to unwrap the plastic around it. The plastic the strongest person on the planet would have trouble getting it off. I had such trouble And used a sharp scissor this wouldn’t cut through this insane thickly wrapped plastic. while attempting to cut the plastic the carafe glass shattered. The glass is so thin if you look at it very long it will shatter. If you buy this thing it is so thin it will not be long before you break it. No doubt the carafe is made this way so you will have to buy another one to enrich Mr. Coffee. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeman

customer_reviews.title: Did I get two lemons?
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these simply stopped working after the first run-through. The replacement (obviously repackaged) works but makes weak, bad-tasting coffee no matter what or how much coffee I put in (I've tried three kinds). I just don't think it gets hot enough. I'd return it, but the box accidentally went out with the recycling a couple days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: STRONG PLASTIC SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I ran water and vinegar through it several times as well as through the dishwasher. The plastic smell was still very strong when the water heated up. It was easy to return but beware. This can't be good for your health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for home
customer_reviews.text: We go through coffee makers, using them almost daily. I get used to the one that I have over time and then when I go to buy a new one, can't usually order the same one. I purchased this Mr. Coffee model after reading reviews. Pro: it doesn't have a light/display on the front, it's on the bottom so I don't see the light from the bedroom. Con: the automatic button isn't very buttony. And I have to often push multiple times to get it to turn on. This is a pain. Other than that, it's an OK coffee maker. Not the best one, and probably not the worst one.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: All I needed for a great cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, no frills coffee maker. Consistent taste (I weigh out the grams of ground coffee to measured water ratio.) Easy to clean - just needs a little finesse the first time to figure out the angle at which to hold the cover to ease it off the coffee maker when disassembling. I like that everything but the base and the filter can be cleaned in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Lisanh1

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage. Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, while the pot itself is nice, the design was poorly done, could not possibly have been tested. The lid of the pot itself overlaps the glass rim, and as a result when the hot coffee leaves condensation on the lid and you pour coffee water runs all over from under the lid. UPDATE! Dropping this to one star...the silver coating is flaking off now. This pot is barely over a month old! I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Smiledsign

customer_reviews.title: Sink washing works just fine!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the description said it could be be washed in the dishwasher, but when i contacted the manufacturer, they said they have stopped making this model because the plastic material does not stand up to that. So, I returned it, only to realize I could wash it in the sink! I ordered it again. I like that I can take it apart and clean the insides thoroughly. Thank you, Amazon, for your great service and patience!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews weren’t 5 star, seems the biggest negative was the issue of pouring. The pot will leak when pouring if you pour fast but if you take your time it doesn’t leak. I really like being able to take it apart for cleaning. We are big coffee drinkers and each of us drinks a different type of Starbucks so we make 2 pots each morning. Take the pot apart and wash it thoroughly before using and there will not be a “plastic” taste.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: good coffee maker moderate price
customer_reviews.text: This coffee make works great and keeps the coffee at a constant temperature. we like the ability to put the components in the dishwasher. I subtracted one star because mine was missing 2 of the rubber feet, not a deal breaker but a little annoying as it slides around the counter. Overall this coffee maker exceeded my expectations and I'm a coffee snob!
customer_reviews.author: Robert O.

customer_reviews.title: Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: So this made me smile. I'm a Mr. Coffee for life. I've had nothing but the best luck with their coffee pots! I about lost it when I saw that this is dishwasher safe. I got it and tried it. So far so good. The flavor is wonderful with the charcoal filter.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix9

customer_reviews.title: Big & Bulky only serious criticism
customer_reviews.text: Makes a decent cup of coffee, if measured in heaping spoons. Very easy to use and good instructions. Quite big and bulky, taking up more space than expected. I have not used the extra filter equipment, but it is a nice addition if needed. Also nice to have a mesh basket, if you do not wish to use paper filters. Basic parts are easy to clean, but the water reservoir still needs special cleaning separately.
customer_reviews.author: Kaggy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Having tried many different coffee brewers this one works the best. It makes no mess when removing the coffee pot while brewing and the coffee grains are not splattered all over while brewing and can be thoroughly cleaned easily.
customer_reviews.author: Theodor L. Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Quit working 2 days after warranty expired.
customer_reviews.text: I thought Mr. Coffee was a good brand to trust but not so any more. I tried to get this unit fixed through their website, but after entering the info requested and hitting enter... the website locked up and wouldn't move. I had to finally restart my computer to get it released. This coffee maker just quit working. Light was on.. but nobody was home. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Take it apart - put it in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Mr Coffee wins again. This is a solid coffee maker in the mid-price range. It was easy to assemble and use. But the design, allowing me to take it apart and put most of it in the dishwasher, brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Dennison

customer_reviews.title: quit working  .. on button refuses to work  press the button and nothing
customer_reviews.text: chatted with customer service autoboot john N. claimed it was dust or debris ... really dust on my coffee maker ? couldn't had been a bogus switch like maybe 99.9% people would think . I bought this unit specifically because of its cleanability . disassembles to facilitate components to be cleansed in the dishwasher . but claim a dust issue .. in my kitchen . god I just cant win
customer_reviews.author: Jp Pourroy

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker for basic use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the coffee maker to make tea and coffee. It's easy to use and clean. The other reason I bought it was it has a small footprint and doesn't take up alot of room on my counter top. I had the cheapest Mr. Coffee before this one and seem to always get water on the counter when filling it up.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS COFFEE MAKER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT coffee maker for people like me, who love to be able to scrub every part of the maker! This is the cleanest I've ever been able to keep a coffee maker. I have always used Cuisinart coffee makers, but I go tired of buying a $75+ coffee pot multiple times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker so far! Let's see how long it lasts. I am a 'coffee -a- holic' of sorts. Usually I get 8 - 15 or so months use from any coffee maker. My hope is that this one will break that mold.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Bergh

customer_reviews.title: Major fail.
customer_reviews.text: Shiny plastic bits from the "chromed" plastic are now flaking off. I noticed this by finding some in my mouth that had fallen into my coffee. Upon inspection, it now just rubs off with light touch where it's begun to flake. The coffee maker is barely 5 months old.
customer_reviews.author: R. T.

customer_reviews.title: Carafe is too fragile
customer_reviews.text: Carafe breaks easily ( lasted 6 months) and replacement is hard to find and expensive. Will never buy another coffeemaker that doesn’t have a plastic rim around top of carafe. Other than that I do love the fact that the whole tank come off easily and can be cleaned by hand or in d/w!
customer_reviews.author: jfl

customer_reviews.title: So Easy To Clean
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use and the fact that it comes apart for cleaning is a dream come true. I run it through the dishwasher every 3 to 4 days with regular hand washing daily. It brews 12 cups in a flash, I don't even bother to set the auto brew.
customer_reviews.author: Markay Raybon

customer_reviews.title: Great basic coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I like how simple it is to use. Makes coffee and makes coffee on a delayed schedule if you set it up the night before. No unnecessary features (a.k.a. features on other coffee makers that I never used). I like the fact that is comes apart for a good dishwasher cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Erick J.

customer_reviews.title: This coffee maker is the worst
customer_reviews.text: The on/off button is super glitchy. I'll tap it, and it won't turn on. Or it will just randomly shut itself off mid-brewing. It sucks when you think coffee is getting made, and it just decides it's done.
customer_reviews.author: Lucerne07

customer_reviews.title: Decent coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coffee maker. You just have to make sure that the coffee pot is perfectly situated under the drip hole. If not, the coffee will not drip into the pot. It stays in the filter and overflows.
customer_reviews.author: dynamene29

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The programming especially. Just press " brew now" or "brew later" button and put in the time you want it to start.
customer_reviews.author: pamwil

customer_reviews.title: good coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine for me. It took me a bit to figure out how ti disassemble for the dishwasher because I was afraid to break the plastic, but love that you can put the pieces in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to disassemble and clean the brew assembly in the dishwasher. And it is programmable and makes good coffee. Set it before going to bed and coffee is ready in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lau

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Refurbished/Dirty Units as New
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on 5/22, received a poorly taped box on 5/27. The numeric display was dirty and scratched. The BREW NOW button had the paint rubbed off an dirt caked on the button. That, and the cheap plastic housing does not give me confidence in this unit. Will go with Black and Decker.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Stalker

customer_reviews.title: Got a bad one
customer_reviews.text: This would be a good coffee maker except after 3 months the on/off switch is not working.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stawarski

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is perfect! It's easy to use and makes perfect coffee. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aligirl

customer_reviews.title: Coffee grounds overflow into carafe
customer_reviews.text: I like the delayed start feature. What I don’t like is coffee grounds overflow into the pot when making 10-12 cups. Moisture drips when I lift the carafe out. I’m not satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bell

product_meta.title: Mr. Coffee 12 Cup Dishwashable Coffee Maker with Advanced Water Filtration & Permanent Filter
product_meta.description: Enjoy better-tasting Coffee with the Mr. Coffee 12 Cup programmable Coffee maker with dish washable design. It features an easy-to-clean design, and is simple to take apart and reassemble. Dishwashing removes bitter residue by thoroughly cleaning Parts exposed to coffee grounds and water.*caution: the electrical base, power Cord, and plug of the dish washable Coffee maker are not dishwasher safe and should never be immersed in water or other liquids , Black/Chrome
feature_bullets: Easy cleaning: The simple design of this Mr. Coffee Coffee maker means the parts exposed to loose grounds and water Can be easily removed from the base, disassembled and put in the dishwasher; Caution: the electrical base, power Cord, and plug of the dish washable Coffee maker are not dishwasher safe and should never be immersed in water or other liquids
Clean coffeemaker = better Coffee: in the dishwasher, bitter Coffee residue is thoroughly removed to ensure a better tasting cup of Coffee

Coffee when you want it: Dishwasher safe Coffee maker features Grab a cup auto Pause so if you're in a rush, you can drink a cup before brewing finishes, and brew now, brew later, so you can set the Coffee maker to brew exactly when you want it to
Advanced water filtration system that reduces impurities like calcium and chlorine for even better tasting Coffee (replacement cartridges sold separately)
Larger brew basket: bigger brew basket holds 25 percent more grounds than comparable Mr. Coffee 12 cup Coffee makers
More great features: 4 hour auto shut off, automatic clean cycle, a large reusable filter, and 1 year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars418 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
